dict.acceptation: 缺口；分歧；间隔；[植物学]裂；
造成缝隙；使成缺口；使豁裂；
豁开；张开；有缺口；露出裂口；

sent.orig: The COS-7 cells transfected with pEGFP-N3-GAP-43 expressed GAP-43 protein efficiently.
sent.trans: 所构建的GAP-43质粒在COS-7细胞中获得高效表达。

sent.orig: Objective To evaluated the clinical diagnosis of Bart fetus dropsy syndrome with Gap-PCR.
sent.trans: 目的对Gap-PCR在血红蛋白Bart胎儿水肿综合征诊断中的应用价值进行临床证据评估。

sent.orig: The surface physicochemical properties of GAP were studied by means of inverse gas chromatography (IGC) .
sent.trans: 采用反相气相色谱法(IGC)研究了缩水甘油叠氮聚醚(GAP)黏合剂的表面物理化学性质。

sent.orig: Drexler also needs to keep an eye on averting controversy the Gap's use of third-world labor.
sent.trans: 同时，朱克斯勒还不得不关注有关对GAP公司使用第三世界国家劳动力的情况的舆论和报道。

sent.orig: The 38-year-old Liberian-flagged liner was touring the Antarctic, operated by Canada-based GAP Adventures.
sent.trans: 当时这艘38岁的利比亚轮船正在南极旅行，由加拿大的GAP探险组织操控。
